token_info.description: A virtual pet on Tezos. Features:  - Choose from 2 pet species, cat or frog - Choose from 3 pet environments - Custom name for the pet - 1 Year max lifespan - Poor care = death - Local Battles - More types of pet stat - Happiness, Hunger, Fatigue, Boredom, Health, XP - Light switch - Level your pet up by keeping it alive, 5xp gained for every hour it lives, max level = 7 - If your pet dies you can create a new one, and you can reset to a new pet at any time if you wish - A few extra features and surprises across the pet's lifespan
